post.text: So what has the Clinton Foundation been up to? Helping millions of people get more affordable medicine to treat HIV/AIDS.

comment.author: Randall
comment.text: The Clintons can be VERY proud of the work of the Foundation. Millions of people's lives have been saved. This 5-star-rated charity has done amazing work for years ... and NONE of the Clintons have ever taken a penny in salary for the untold hours put into this life-saving work. May the Clinton Foundation continue to serve many, many suffering people of the world. <3

replies.author: Laura
replies.text: Lol I just threw up! Nice try! 👌🏿

replies.author: Randall
replies.text: Robin Sorry the truth sickens you Robin. It is the documented truth. Period!

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: Hillary Clinton's presidential campaign has received more than $20,000 in donations contributed by members of the Ku Klux Klan, a prominent member of the hate group said Monday. "For the KKK, Clinton is our choice," said Will Quigg, California Grand Dragon for the Loyal White Knights, Vocativ
